hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Requiem of Spirit#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Bombchus (20 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Purple Rupee# can be found in #the Thieves' Hideout#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Desert Colossus# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #1# major item.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #the Sun's Song#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #5# major items.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Magic Meter#.

LW (Bridge).text: The hint stone you have dialed&has been disconnected.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the Zora's Domain #diving game and torch run# lead to...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Green Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Slingshot#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Morpha# holds...^ #Saria's Song# and #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Bottom of the Well#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.
